            NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/Div.I(Weapon) 
              BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING (I-III Floor), JANPATH BHAVAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :   08 /04/2009 
 
Circular No.  07 /2009 
 
Subject :  Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by SPG Personnel. 
A copy of DGCA permit number 127-AA/2009, issued under reference No. 8/95/2005-IR 
dated 23-03-2009 regarding authorization to the Special Protection Group Personnel  for 
carriage of arms and ammunition by air to/from any point  within India, is forwarded herewith for 
information and necessary action by all concerned. 
 
 
Encl : As above. 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
